alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 1:54PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rosebud and northeastern Treasure Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Hysham, moving east at 20 mph. The storm will impact travel on US-12 northwest of Forsyth. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, wind gusts in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vananda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
